about_the_game: Experience a new perspective with Momentum, a physics based platformer. Choose one of many unlockable balls, and then skillfully maneuver it through 3D labyrinths. Race the clock as you rotate labyrinths and use gravity to your advantage. But be careful, because you could easily lose control. Momentum’s zen atmosphere contrasts with its challenging gameplay. The soothing soundtrack and detailed environments combine to create a truly unique, relaxing vibe.
detailed_description: Experience a new perspective with Momentum, a physics based platformer. Choose one of many unlockable balls, and then skillfully maneuver it through 3D labyrinths. Race the clock as you rotate labyrinths and use gravity to your advantage. But be careful, because you could easily lose control. Momentum’s zen atmosphere contrasts with its challenging gameplay. The soothing soundtrack and detailed environments combine to create a truly unique, relaxing vibe.
name: Momentum Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X2 555 / Intel Core i5-430M / ~ 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450 / Radeon HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 945 / Intel Core i5750 / ~3GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7990
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Overcome obstacles and subvert gravity in this difficult 3D physics-platformer. Race against time as you rotate 3D labyrinths to navigate through them. Reach a zen state of mind through challenge, focus, and atmosphere.
